/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings and trees line the sides of the highway, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is taken from a low angle, making the buildings and trees appear taller and more imposing.
